item.description:
Please join me and my daughter as we raise funds for Multiple Myeloma, a rare cancer. Multiple myeloma occurs when one type of white blood cell, a plasma cell, reproduces without stopping and causes damage to other organs. We will be raising funds in memory of our good friend Mike Shebak who lost his battle with the disease in September of 2011.

The registration fee is $25.00 per person.  If you raise $50 in donations your registration fee will only be $10.00.  Donation checks can be made out to MMore

Come and have a fun time while raising money for a great cause.  There will be prizes and raffles!!!

We hope to see you there!

This is Candlepin bowling not ten pin.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Bowl-A-Thon for Multiple Myeloma
